00094 class AlignedContig {
00095 
00096  public:  
00097 
00103   AlignedContig(const std::string &sam, const BamTools::BamReader * reader, const GenomicRegion &twindow);
00104 
00105   bool hasvariant = false; 
00107   vector<BreakPoint> break_vec; 
00108   BreakPoint global_bp  
00110   ReadVec m_bamreads; 
00112   AlignmentFragmentVector m_align; 
00114   string samrecord; 
00116   GenomicRegion window; 
00118   bool skip = false; 
00123   bool isBetter(const AlignedContig &ac) const;
00124   
00130   void addAlignment(const BamTools::BamAlignment align);
00131 
00133   void addDiscordantCluster(DiscordantCluster dc) { m_dc.push_back(dc); } 
00134 
00138   string printDiscordantClusters() const;
00139 
00141   string getContigName() const { assert(m_align.size()); return m_align[0].align.Name; }
00142 
00146   int getMaxMapq() const { 
00147     int m = -1;
00148     for (auto& i : m_align)
00149       if (i.align.MapQuality > m)
00150         m = i.align.MapQuality;
00151     return m;
00152   }
00153 
00157   int getMinMapq() const { 
00158     int m = 1000;
00159     for (auto& i : m_align)
00160       if (i.align.MapQuality < m)
00161         m = i.align.MapQuality;
00162     return m;
00163   }
00164 
00169   void splitCoverage();
00170 
00178   bool parseDiscovarName(const std::string &name, int &tumor, int&normal);
00179 
00183   void printContigFasta(ofstream &ostream) const;
00184 
00187   void getBreakPairs();
00188 
00194   void alignReadsToContigs(ReadVec &bav, bool indel = true);
00195 
00197   string getSequence() const { assert(m_seq.length()); return m_seq; }
00198 
00200   bool hasSubSequence(const string& subseq) const { 
00201     return (m_seq.find(subseq) != string::npos);
00202   }
00203   
00205   friend ostream& operator<<(ostream &out, const AlignedContig &ac);
00206

00217 struct PlottedRead {
00218 
00219   int pos;
00220   string seq;
00221   string info;
00222 
00223   bool operator<(const PlottedRead& pr) const {
00224     return (pos < pr.pos);
00225   }
00226 
00227 };
00228 
00229 typedef vector<PlottedRead> PlottedReadVector;
00230 
00231 struct PlottedReadLine {
00232 
00233   vector<PlottedRead*> read_vec;
00234   int available = 0;
00235   int contig_len = 0;
00236 
00237   void addRead(PlottedRead *r) {
00238     read_vec.push_back(r);
00239     available = r->pos + r->seq.length() + 5;
00240   }
00241 
00242   bool readFits(PlottedRead &r) {
00243     return (r.pos >= available);
00244   }
00245 
00246   friend ostream& operator<<(ostream& out, const PlottedReadLine &r) {
00247     int last_loc = 0;
00248     for (auto& i : r.read_vec) {
00249       assert(i->pos - last_loc >= 0);
00250       out << string(i->pos - last_loc, ' ') << i->seq;
00251       last_loc = i->pos + i->seq.length();
00252     }
00253     int name_buff = r.contig_len - last_loc;
00254     assert(name_buff < 10000);
00255     out << string(max(name_buff, 5), ' ');
00256     for (auto& i : r.read_vec) { // add the data
00257       out << i->info << ",";
00258     }
00259     return out;
00260   }
00261 
00262 };
00263 
00264 typedef vector<PlottedReadLine> PlottedReadLineVector;
